articles.title: Talks between FMs of DPRK and Gambia Held
articles.content:
Talks between FMs of DPRK and Gambia Held 
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Talks between foreign ministers of the DPRK and Gambia took place at the building of the Foreign Ministry of Gambia on June 5. 
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, who is leading the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Gambia, and the DPRK ambassador to Gambia and from the opposite side Gambian Foreign Minister Aboubacar Abudoullah Senghore and the vice general secretary for bilateral political relations and the vice general secretary for multilateral cooperation of the Foreign Ministry of Gambia. 
					
					 Both sides exchanged views on boosting the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation and on matters of mutual concern. 
					
					 The Gambian foreign minister said he could not repress his admiration for the efforts made by the supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un to defend sovereignty of the country and regional peace and security with great pluck and guts. 
					
					 Expressing sincere thanks for the DPRK government's support for the struggle of the Gambian government and people, he said it is the invariable stand of the Gambian government to further develop the cooperative relations between the two countries in all fields. 
					
					 Gambia will continue to boost the relations of support and cooperation with the friendly DPRK in the international arena, he added.

articles.title: Nigerian Figures Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Nigerian Figures Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Jidda Baba Ahmed, secretary of the Borno State Government of Nigeria, and his party visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae where the President spent his childhood, the guests looked round the historic relics preserved with much care there, being briefed on the story about the home.
					
					 They toured the historic relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The secretary said the President was born in a simple family and grew up while cultivating his great intention of the revolution from his childhood.
					
					 The family members in Mangyongdae are patriots who devoted their all to the country and the people all their lives, he said.
					
					 The visit offered an opportunity to know well about the history of the arduous struggle waged by the President, he added.
					
					 They toured the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the secretary said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un has shown deep loving care for the people. We came to know well about the warm love for the people shown by him who spares nothing for the health of the people, he added.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Okryu Children's Hospital and Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: New Film Produced in the DPRK
articles.content:
New Film Produced in the DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Nunbora production unit of the Korean Film Studio produced first five parts of the multi-part feature film "Battle area without gunfire".
					 The film version of the novel of the same title vividly portrays revolutionary soldiers who bravely struggled for the party, leader, country and people in the area occupied by the enemy right after the liberation of the country, disclosing the U.S. imperialists' scenario for a war.
					
					 The film will instill into the people the truth that those who believe and follow only their leader will be honored.
					
					 The production continues.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of S. Korean Group's Theory of War against North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of S. Korean Group's Theory of War against North 
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- These days the south Korean puppet authorities are misleading the public by spreading such rubbish that south Korea should spearhead the unification move. 
					 Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs, recently let loose foolish remarks before diplomatic envoys in south Korea that it has advanced step by step toward unification on the basis of "confidence building process" despite "persistent provocations" by someone. 
					
					 Korea's reunification is not an issue of one side leading and the other being led, Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says, and goes on:
					
					 National reunification is a nationwide cause to be independently achieved by the concerted efforts of all the Koreans by rejecting domination and interference by outside forces. 
					
					 Unification of social systems in which one side swallows up the other side with the help of outside forces is not reunification and it will only bring a national disaster. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities' loud call for "unification" is the clear revelation of their attempt to ignite a nuclear war against the north. 
					
					 They raised the non-existent issue of "human rights in the north", egged human scum on to breed plots and stage all sorts of farces and set up the UN office on "human rights in north" in south Korea, coming out to be a shock brigade serving the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" racket. 
					
					 All these facts go to prove that the south Korean puppet group has gone desperate in their try to ignite a war against the north with the backing of the U.S. despite its call for "unification". 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should no longer mock at the Korean nation and the world public over the reunification issue.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Designation of Kim Kwan Jin as Chief of Security Office of Chongwadae
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Designation of Kim Kwan Jin as Chief of Security Office of Chongwadae
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Park Geun Hye designated Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense, as the chief of the security office of Chongwadae, a post of handling all the issues related with diplomacy and security, under the cloak of "personnel shakeup".
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Sunday carries a commentary.
					
					 It says: 
					
					 Kim's designation is a serious mockery and challenge to the south Korean mindset and the public at home and abroad demanding the overhaul of the north-south ties and the withdrawal of the confrontational policy.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin is a rare warmonger who often let loose strings of extremely dangerous and bellicose outbursts.
					
					 Nevertheless, Park Geun Hye designated Kim, a clear indication that she never wishes for the detente and improvement of relations between the north and the south.
					
					 She is seriously miscalculated if she thinks she can guarantee the security by designating Kim to the post.
					
					 But it will only bring about disaster, not security.
					
					 If Park keeps Kim under her wing and let the wolf go on the rampage in the yard, she will meet a serious loss. This is an advice to the puppet chief executive.
					
					 She had better behave herself, bearing the DPRK's warning in her mind.

articles.title: Military Exercises Targeting DPRK to Be Waged in U.S. Mainland
articles.content:
Military Exercises Targeting DPRK to Be Waged in U.S. Mainland
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist and south Korean war-like forces plan to wage combined military exercises targeting the DPRK in the U.S. mainland from June 9, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The military drills are aimed to destroy weapons of mass destruction such as the nukes and biochemical weapons of the DPRK to cope with what the warmongers call the "contingency in the north".
					
					 The exercises are to be staged in a military training base in the U.S. mainland for four weeks.
					
					 A motorized infantry unit, the special warfare command, and a chemical, biological and radioactive unit of the south Korean army are to take part in the military drills.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life are condemning the drills, saying that they are aimed at acquiring the combined operation capability to destroy the north's nukes together with a U.S. chemical unit redeployed in south Korea.
					
					 South Korean military forces, meanwhile, are waging a joint naval drill together with the U.S. aggression forces in the East Sea of Korea to attack the DPRK, according to the south Korean MBC on June 6.
					
					 Among the warships involved in the drill are John S. McCain, the capital ship of the 7th Fleet of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, two Aegis ships, a submarine, an antisubmarine patrol plane, etc. which have the whole of the Korean Peninsula as their operational theatre.
					
					 As they are driven into a tight corner by the catastrophic ferry sinking disaster, the south Korean war hawks are recklessly resorting to the drill for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK in league with the U.S. imperialists in order to tide over the crisis with war exercises.

articles.title: Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Hand-foot-mouth disease is rapidly spreading in south Korea, according to the south Korean KBS on June 6.
					 According to an investigation by a relevant organ, 21.6 out of 1,000 outpatients were suspected to be infected with the hand-foot-mouth disease for one week at the end of May, a drastic increase from the same period last year. 
					
					 The highly contagious disease is seriously threatening the lives of children, in particular.

articles.title: Election Results Are Warning of S. Korean People: S. Korean Media
articles.content:
Election Results Are Warning of S. Korean People: S. Korean Media 
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Munhwa Ilbo in an editorial on June 5 said the results of the June 4 elections to the local self-governing bodies were a serious warning of the south Korean people to Park Geun Hye. 
					 The present "government's" incompetent approach to the ferry Sewol disaster had a big impact on the people and Park Geun Hye should keenly accept the mindset of the people, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The judgment given to Park by the people is a yellow card and this shows that they can raise a red card for her resignation next time. 
					
					 Yet, Chongwadae thinks it was relieved of burden of mid-term estimate, a misjudgment of the public mindset. 
					
					 Even figures of the ruling camp continuously urge Park Geun Hye to change her self-righteousness way of state policy administration. 
					
					 The newspaper Hangyore also carried a similar editorial on the same day. 
					
					 It said the Democratic Alliance for New Politics won a landslide victory in the election for the Mayor of Seoul, a revelation of the mindset of the people, and the opposition party dominated the Chungchong provincial area. 
					
					 Candidates from the "Saenuri Party" had tight matches even in the areas which they claimed to be traditional base of the ruling camp and this proved that the ruling camp was forsaken by the people, the editorial said, adding: 
					
					 The elections to the local self-governing bodies are the first step of the people's judgment. The ruling and opposite parties should keep in mind the truth they will be forced to withdraw unless they breathe as one with the people.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in Dalian, China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in Dalian, China
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Kimjongilia exhibition took place in Dalian City, Liaoning Province, China from June 1 to 5 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event was a photo of Kim Jong Il meeting with Xi Jinping with the flags of the two countries in the background.
					
					 On show there were photos documenting undying feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un, and books and photos introducing the Korean people in their efforts to perform miracles in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The exhibition hall decorated with over 10 000 potted Kimjongilias was amazing.
					
					 The hall was crowded with a large number of people every day who were fascinated by the flowers.
					
					 The vice-secretary general of the Dalian City People's Government said that he could not forget Kim Jong Il's visit to the city. He went on:
					
					 Upon the news of his tour of several units in the city I was deeply impressed to hear that the top leader of the country was so much concerned about the field related to improving the people's living standard.
					
					 His visit to the city greatly contributed to the development of Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 The chairman of the Dalian City Floricultural Association said:
					
					 Kimjongilias will be in full bloom in the city thanks to the great reverence of the Chinese people for Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 I will make positive efforts for the cultivation of the flowers in not only the city but also other places of China.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Body
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK issued a statement on June 2 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The undying feats of Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, are of great historic significance.
					
					 We have formed a committee for remembering the President on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 We plan to distribute works of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un to the people.
					
					 Preparations are now underway to carry articles praising the great life of the President and the gist of the reminiscences of the President "With the Century" in publications.
					
					 The statement said that colorful events were due to be held to praise the President.
					
					 It also expressed full support for the appeal of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea to hold an internet seminar on the great life and undying feats of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The International Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on June 1.
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions issued an information bulletin as regards the formation of the committee.
					
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 The followers of the Juche idea lost the great leader, who was their father and comrade, as a result of his demise, adding he was illustrious partisan commander and an outstanding revolutionary.
					
					 The Juche idea followers in East European and Central Asian Regions recognize that it is very important for them to deeply study Kim Il Sung's idea and exploits and widely disseminate them on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The international alliance decides to map out a unified plan for studying the ideological heritage, heroic epic life and immortal exploits of the President and disseminating them worldwide.
					
					 The information bulletin said members of the committee were elected and they include the general secretary of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions, the chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the February 16 Youth Society for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Politics of Belarus, the chairman of the Kazakh Kim Jong Il Association for the Study and Dissemination of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Moldovan Songun Youth Union for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism.

articles.title: Events Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee
articles.content:
Events Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee 
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Celebration events took place in different countries on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Round-table talks took place in Malaysia, a reading session in Angola and a photo exhibition in South Africa in the period between May 26 and June 2.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos dealing with the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il in party-building.
					
					 The director of the Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia said:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Il was a benevolent father, great leader and teacher of the Korean people.
					
					 I keenly felt the greatness of Kim Jong Il through the visit to the DPRK.
					
					 He was a peerlessly great politician who turned the WPK into a powerful party.
					
					 The WPK is leading the revolution and construction to victory thanks to his tireless efforts.
					
					 The DPRK is accelerating the construction of an economic power with confidence in victory while demonstrating its might as an impregnable military power as Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The Korean people will register greater successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Figures including a vice-director of an Angolan company said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il provided a reliable guarantee for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula by pursuing Songun politics.
					
					 As the DPRK possessed the powerful nuclear deterrence, the days when the U.S. threatened the DPRK with nuclear weapons have gone never to return. 
					
					 Humankind will keep in mind forever the exploit Kim Jong Il performed for the cause of peace on the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.
